name: Silent Hill Pizza Delivery
description:
Swerve your way through the ever-changing roads of Silent Hill to deliver a freshly made Large Pepperoni Pizza to a mysterious customer at the heart of this cursed town.

The barrels that block your way are in on the Silent Hill conspiracy, the only way to the customer is through them.

Combo one barrel into another to get extra points!

Will you be able to deliver on time? Or will the barrels succeed in their dastardly plan to prevent fresh pizza deliveries?

 

Snack on Pizza along the way to give you x2 points!

Controls:

<- or A - Steer left

-> or D - Steer right

Get pizza for x2 points!

Music taken from here.
